name: Curse at Twilight: Thief of Souls
name_original: Curse at Twilight: Thief of Souls
description:
Curse at Twilight: Thief of Souls is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Amaranth Games. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Amaranth Games.
Curse at Twilight: Thief of Souls is available on PC.
